Edges-Druid -- Male Human Heroic Druid
Attributes (12 Points):
Agility: d6 Smarts: d8 Spirit: d12 Strength: d6 Vigor: d12
Attribute Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Attribute Points
Young: -1 Attribute Points
Armor Interference: -4 Agility w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Skills (12 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d6 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d4 Riding: (agi) d6 Survival: (sma) d12
Language (Common): (sma) d8 Shooting: (agi) d4 Thievery: (agi) d6
Notice: (sma) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d4
Languages: Abyssal; Aklo; Aquan; Auran; Common
Skill Notes:
Nature Sense: Survival linked to Spirit instead of Smarts
Young: -2 Skill Points
Armor Interference: -4 Faith and Agility-based skills w/medium or heavy armor or shield
Can't Swim: -2 Athletics (swimming)
Thin Skinned: -2 vs. Taunt
Size: 0 Alignment: Neutral Deity: None
Advances: 12 Improvement Points: 28 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 14; Edge: 12; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (9 points): Attuned: 1; Beast Master: 1; Divine Mastery: 1; Druid: 1; Favored Powers (Druid): 1; New Powers: 2; Power Points: 1; Wild Shape: 1 Hindrances: Can't Swim; Quirk; Thin Skinned; Young Human Features: Adaptability
Feature Notes:
Adaptability: +1 Edge Points
Druid: Has Arcane Background (Druid), Armor Interference, Nature Bond, Nature Sense, Secret Language (Druidic), Vow+, and Wilderness Stride features
Nature Bond: +1 Edge Points (Attuned or Beast Master)
Beast Master: Has animal companion; other animals will not attack first
Quirk: Has minor compulsion that occasionally causes trouble
Secret Language (Druidic): Can converse secretly w/other druids
Vow+: Has strict restrictions on behavior and decisions
Young: +1 Benny each session
Combat
Parry: 3 (1) Cover: 0 Toughness: 10 (2) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: Leather Jacket Shield: Light Shield Weapons: Dagger (d6+d4 R3"); Light Repeating Crossbow (2d6 R10" AP 2); Short Sword (d6+d6); Unarmed (d6+d0)
Combat Notes:
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +6
Can't Swim: Moves 1/3 Pace through water
Wilderness Stride: Ignores movement penalties for difficult ground
Arcana
Power Count: 7 Power Points: 15
Powers:
Burst: (2 PP Evoc) R9" Cone inflicts 2d6 damage (Raise 3d6) (+2 PP Inflicts 3d6 damage (Raise 4d6); +4 PP Inflicts 4d6 damage (Raise 5d6) as heavy weapon)
Darksight: (1 PP Tran) R8" Target ignores 4 points (Raise 6 points) of illumination penalties for 1 hr (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Target ignores all illumination penalties and 4 points from invisibility)
Empathy: (1 PP Ench) R8" Self learns target emotions and surface thoughts, gaining +1 Intimidation, Persuasion, Performance, and Taunt (Raise +2; Spirit neg) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Makes uncooperative or neutral target cooperative (Raise friendly); +1 PP Effect lasts 5 min; +2 PP Self can detect target's lies)
Entangle: (2 PP Tran) R8" Restrains target (Raise binds; Athletics or breaking Hardness 5 frees) (+2/+3 PP 2"/3" radius; +2/+4 PP Inflicts 2d4/2d6 damage; +1 PP Entangling material has Hardness 10)
Protection: (2 PP Abju) R8" Target gains +2 Armor (Raise +2 Toughness) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target)
Shape Change: (3+ PP Tran) RSelf transforms into animal form (Raise +1 Strength and Vigor) for 5 rd (+1 PP Effects last 5 min; +2/+3 PP Effect willing target at range touch/8")
Smite: (2 PP Tran) R8" Target weapon inflicts +2 damage (Raise +4) for 5 rd (+1 PP/additional target; +2 PP Inflicts +4 damage (Raise +6) as heavy weapon)
Common Power Modifiers: +1 PP Adaptable Caster; +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Druid): 3 Powers/10 Power Points
New Powers: +4 Power Count
Power Points: +5 Power Points
Attuned: May reroll failed Faith to cast spell
Divine Mastery: May use epic power modifiers on divine spells
Favored Powers (Druid): May ignore two points of penalties when casting Entangle, Protection, or Smite
Wild Shape: May cast Shape Change at double duration
